spikeRoller.description: Shoots a spiked ball in a fixed straight line which goes through many enemies
spikeRoller.name: Spike roller

spikeRoller.description: Shoots a bigger spiked ball which does more damage
spikeRoller.name: Big spiked ball

spikeRoller.description: Spiked ball does more damage, pierce, and slight knockback
spikeRoller.name: Heavy spiked ball

spikeRoller.description: Slightly more pierce, much more knockback
spikeRoller.name: Steam roller

spikeRoller.description: Glue keeps enemies slower. Also more pierce, damage, and knockback
spikeRoller.name: Glue roller

spikeRoller.description: Shoots smaller spiked balls but much faster
spikeRoller.name: Small spiked ball
Gold rocket gun
spikeRoller.description: Shoots better rockets, and 3 at different angles
Spiked balls have increased pierce, and slightly better fire rate / damage
spikeRoller.name: Electric spikes
Plasma ball
spikeRoller.description: Shoots balls of plasma instead of spiked balls, with even better pierce

spikeRoller.name: Laser turret
spikeRoller.description: Instead of a spiked ball, shoots a laser beam with infinite pierce

spikeRoller.name: Giant flashlight
spikeRoller.description: Giant flashlight apparently deals more damage, also the beam gets wider the further away

mine.description: Mines nearby ores, increasing your resources
mine.name: Mine
Laser mine

Mines faster, and additionally mines iron

mine.description: Mines larger yields and radius but slower
mine.name: Bigger bomb mine
Larger radius
mine.description: Mines a bigger radius, but less ore

mine.name: Fracking mine

Mines a huge radius, but degrades every tower

turretFlamethrower.description: Close range tower with good pierce and a burn effect which persists after enemies leave the tower's radius
turretFlamethrower.name: Flamethrower

turretFlamethrower.description: More direct damage, much more burn damage, and longer lasting burn
turretFlamethrower.name: More volatile fuel

turretFlamethrower.description: More pierce, damage, burn damage, and burn lasts much longer
turretFlamethrower.name: Yellow fire
Green fire
turretFlamethrower.description: Chemical burn (can be combined with freeze), more damage
Replaces with the doom effect: major percent damage over time, slower speed, and multiplied damage from all attacks, permanently

turretFlamethrower.description: Increased pierce, damage, and turn speed
turretFlamethrower.name: Faster fuel

turretFlamethrower.name: Circle of fire

turretFlamethrower.description: Massive damage, and makes enemies in radius slower and more vulnerable

turretBomb.name: Bomb launcher
turretBomb.description: Shoots a bomb which explodes on impact, damaging nearby enemies

turretBomb.name: Atomic bombs
turretBomb.description: Increased damage and blast radius, replaces effect with chemical burn
Increased range, and bombs travel above enemies to target
turretBomb.name: Upward launcher
Missile launcher
turretBomb.description: Massive range, shoots missiles which hone onto targets
Shoots 3 missiles at once. Special targeting mode means that each missile will target different enemies
turretBomb.name: Triple launcher
Silo
turretBomb.description: Increased range, shoots individual bombs but 7x as fast
Shoots better missiles, increased range, slightly faster than before
turretBomb.name: Super Silo
Stun bomb
turretBomb.description: Stuns enemies, and more knockback and damage
Bombs create a black hole which stuns even resistant enemies and draws them to the center
turretBomb.name: Black hole bomb

freeze.description: Slows enemies in range. Remember that burn and freeze cancel each other out
Enemies stay frozen after they leave and 'thaw out' over a period of time

freeze.description: Enemies move slower, and affect resistant enemies

freeze.description: Enemies are less resistant to other attacks, and take slight damage while in radius

freeze.description: Increased vulnerability, slightly increased damage, affects resistant enemies more
